snippet.title: Bounce Arcade Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Bounce Arcade is pinball blasted into the future!

Enter the machine and play pinball like you've never seen before! Play through multiple thrilling tables, strive to survive, unlock mini-games, and chase high scores in next-level action gameplay.

Bounce Arcade mixes pinball classics like multiball with new mechanics like lassos and mini-games only possible in VR. Enter the zone and keep the ball alive!

From Velan Studios, the team behind Knockout City and Hot Wheels Rift Rally.

Coming fall 2024 for Meta Quest.

#BounceArcade #VelanStudios
